Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A case of acute renal failure , due to occlusion of renal vessels in a patient with acute promyelocytic leukemia ( APL ) treated with all - trans - retinoic acid ( ATRA ) and tranexamic acid has been described recently .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |

| Acute promyelocytic leukemia (APL) |
| All-trans-retinoic acid (ATRA) |
| Tranexamic acid |

Note that "all-trans-retinoic acid" and "tranexamic acid" are not diseases, but they are mentioned in the context of treating acute promyelocytic leukemia, so I have included them in the table.
